name: QuadroCraft (Demo Avaliable)
description:
QuadroCraft is similar to Minecraft but has additional mechanics and more

If you want to unlock the skin packs, buy QuadroCraft Premium.

If you don't want to pay to play QuadroCraft, download QuadroCraft Demo or QuadroCraft Trial (2 different games).

You have the option to play solo, play in local multiplayer and external multiplayer.

And you have the option to use custom skins, that is, use a supported image as a skin.

What are you waiting to buy or download!
